title: Quick Start
content: Quick Start Guide Welcome to Flow Forms! This guide will help you get started quickly. Installation Getting started with Flow Forms is easy: Sign up for an account Create your first form Embed it on your website Creating Your First Form To create your first form: Click "New Form" in your dashboard Choose a template or start from scratch Add your fields Configure your settings Publish your form Next Steps Check out our Security documentation Read about advanced form features Explore integration...
headings: Quick Start Guide Installation Creating Your First Form Next Steps

title: Security
content: Security at Flow Forms At Flow Forms, security is fundamental to everything we do. We implement enterprise-grade security measures and follow industry-standard frameworks to protect your data and ensure reliable service delivery. Security Framework Flow Forms implements security controls based on the CIS (Center for Internet Security) Controls, a globally recognized cybersecurity framework designed to protect organizations against the most common cyber attacks. This framework ensures we...
headings: Security at Flow Forms Security Framework Infrastructure Security Amazon Web Services (AWS) Database Security with Neon Postgres Content Delivery with Cloudflare Application Security Data Protection Access Control & Authentication Application Security Measures Development & Operations Security Secure Development Lifecycle Access Management Monitoring & Response Data Privacy & Compliance Data Handling Employee Security Continuous Improvement Transparency & Communication Security Incident Response Security Contact

title: Overview
content: Forms Overview Forms are the heart of Flow Forms. This guide covers everything you need to know about creating and managing forms. What are Flow Forms? Flow Forms are dynamic, customizable forms that can be embedded anywhere on your website. They provide: Real-time validation - Validate fields as users type Conditional logic - Show/hide fields based on responses Multi-step workflows - Break complex forms into steps Rich field types - Text, email, file uploads, and more Creating Your First Form...
headings: Forms Overview What are Flow Forms? Creating Your First Form Form Settings Next Steps

title: Field Types
content: Field Types Flow Forms supports a wide variety of field types to collect exactly the data you need. Text Fields Single Line Text Perfect for names, titles, and short responses. Multi-line Text For longer responses like comments and feedback. Email Built-in email validation ensures you get valid email addresses. Phone Number Handles international phone number formats automatically. Selection Fields Dropdown Present users with a list of options to choose from. Radio Buttons When users should...
headings: Field Types Text Fields Single Line Text Multi-line Text Email Phone Number Selection Fields Dropdown Radio Buttons Checkboxes Advanced Fields File Upload Date Picker Number Input URL Field Field Validation Next Steps
